about_the_game: This is the Demo to Plates of Peril, a dark dungeon-cooking game where you gather ingredients, prepare dishes, and serve them to demanding customers. Play solo or team up with up to 3 friends as you survive the chaos to become the ultimate chef in a dungeon full of danger.

content_descriptors.notes: Plates of Peril contains mild horror themes, possible consumption of alcohol, and occasional acts of violence.
